name: The Undending Sacrament of Mornings
description:
The Unending Sacrament of Mornings was created during the Global Game Jam 2016. It was created by Alexander King and Seth S. Scott. The theme of this years Global Game Jam was "Ritual". The Unending Sacrament of Mornings was nominated for Best Art and won Best Overall Game at the NYU Game Center Location.

(Headphones recommended)

Feel free to reach out to us online:

@LiterallyAKing & @sssetz
